projectGridLines.title: Automated Interview Tool
projectGridLines.description:
Description: An interview tool made for companies like upgrad, etc. to conduct interviews and viva without human interaction

Skill sets: Deep Learning, Reinforcement learning, Large language Models

Traits expectation: Machine Learning, Deep Learning

Expected learning: Large Language models interfacing, Using techniques like RL with these models to build a robust system

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science

projectGridLines.title: Satellite Image processing
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Process Images from satellite data to detect anomalies and aid DRDO in the same for extracting features

Skill sets: Deep Learning, Image Processing

Traits expectation: Machine Learning, Deep Learning

Expected learning: Attention Mechanism, CNNs

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science

projectGridLines.title: General purpose SLM
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Make a general purpose SLMs for different modularities which can be built upon as per need of the client

Skill sets: Deep Learning, Large Language Models

Traits expectation: Machine Learning, Deep Learning

Expected learning: Large Language models, Audio, Text, Image processing

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science
